item.title: Preprints
item.description: Animation for SelectNet vs other method: Left: Green: SelectNet; Red: residual; Blue: solution error Right: Red: residual v.s. iterations; Blue: solution error v.s. iterations SelectNet: Self-Paced Learning for High-Dimensional Partial Differential Equations, with Y. Gu and H. Yang, arXiv:2001.04860, 2020. PDF. Submitted. Power Forward Performance in Semimartingale Markets with Stochastic Integrated Factors, with L. Bo and A. Capponi, arXiv:1811.11899, 2020. PDF.
